title: Portia DeRossi: Meet the Author
itunes:subtitle: The actor and author is interviewed about her memoir.
itunes:summary: Actor and author Portia DeRossi discusses her unflinchingly honest book, “Unbearable Lightness: A Story of Loss and Gain” with guest moderator Whoopi Goldberg.
